body_html:
Have I written custom code: No
OS Platform and Distribution: Ubuntu 16.04
TensorFlow installed from: pip install tensorflow-gpu
TensorFlow version 1.5.0
Bazel version: 0.9.0
CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda 9.0 cudnn 7.0.5
GPU model and memory: gtx 1070 8gb
Exact command to reproduce
open pthon
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session()
sess.close()
close python
repeat three times. get out of memory error

I think it has something to do with the nvidia driver. I went down to the 390.12 version from 390.3 and the problem got better. I am able to close the terminal and open a new one now and i do not get the issue. However if I dont close the terminal but close the python session and start a new one I still get the error.

body:
Have I written custom code: No
OS Platform and Distribution: Ubuntu 16.04
TensorFlow installed from: pip install tensorflow-gpu
TensorFlow version 1.5.0
Bazel version: 0.9.0
CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda 9.0 cudnn 7.0.5
GPU model and memory: gtx 1070 8gb
Exact command to reproduce
open pthon 
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session()
sess.close()
close python
repeat three times. get out of memory error

I think it has something to do with the nvidia driver. I went down to the 390.12 version from 390.3 and the problem got better. I am able to close the terminal and open a new one now and i do not get the issue. However if I dont close the terminal but close the python session and start a new one I still get the error.
